TopicTitle: How do you stop vehicles from rolling away when you are EVA

Articles.Content:
My plane keeps rolling away, first time is funny, 50th time not so much. Apparently there is a parking brake if you double tap B but it doesnt work. I have no mods installed any ideas ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-29T23:58:20Z" title="04/29/2015 11:58  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 29, 2015</time> by leocrumb**
There is also a small button on you altimeter (top center), which enables/disables brakes. It is below the lights and the landing gear buttons. If it is lit up, the brakes are on, and vice versa.

I think "B" is "apply brakes," which get released when you let go. The button on top is toggle.

If you try to set action groups, you'll notice there's three different actions available - activate, release, and toggle.

Clicking the parking brake button is the best answer. I also have good results simply retracting the landing gear, which helps the EVA get back in the vessel if I haven't unlocked ladders yet. That also prevents the plane from rolling away I suppose.
